name: GuardSpine Governance
description: Deny-by-default governance layer for OpenClaw. Gates dangerous tool calls through L0-L4 risk tiers with evidence packs, 3-model council review, L3.5 Opus tie-breaker, pattern authorization bypass, and remote approval. Includes memory_status context gauge for amnesia detection.

enforcement_mode.description: enforce = block unauthorized actions, audit = log but allow, disabled = no checks

discord_approval_target.description: Discord target for L4 approvals (e.g. user:123456789 or channel:123456789). If unset, file-only fallback.
